col.name: alt_sample_name
description: if another identifier is used, for example in supplemental tables

col.name: unique_patient_ID
description: Use this column if there are technical replicates.  If this column contains non-unique entries, expression values of those arrays will eventually be averaged.

col.name: sample_type
description: healthy should be only from individuals without cancer, adjacentnormal from individuals with cancer, metastatic for non-primary tumors, borderline includes both borderline and LMP tumors, benign for benign tumors.

col.name: histological_type
description: ser=serous;endo=endometrioid;clearcell=mixture of ser+endo.  Other includes sarcomatoid, endometroid, papillary serous, unspecified adenocarcinoma, dysgerminoma

col.name: tumorstage
description: Group Stage (I-IV, translated to 1-4 for R usage.).  If multiple stages given (eg 34), use the highest.

col.name: substage
description: substage (abcd).  For cases like ab, bc, use highest given

col.name: grade
description: G (0-4): If multiple given, ie 12, 23, use highest given

col.name: days_to_tumor_recurrence
description: time to recurrence or last follow-up in days

col.name: days_to_death
description: time to death or last follow-up in days

col.name: site_of_tumor_first_recurrence
description: none for no recurrence, na for unknown

col.name: primary_therapy_outcome_success
description: response to any kind of therapy

col.name: batch
description: batch variable - hybridization date when Affymetrix CEL files are available

col.name: flag
description: Free-form flag to annotate the sample.

col.name: uncurated_author_metadata
description: original uncurated data, with each field separated by ///.
